original_title: Tamed elephants are aging: Diyawadana Nilame warns
original_body_lines: Diyawadana Nilame of the Dalada Maligawa Pradeep Nilanga Dela said that out of 94 tamed elephants, over 60 are over 50 or 60 years old.
“If we don’t receive more tamed elephants by 2040, we would have only about 11 elephants in the next ten to fifteen years,” he warned.
